creator: aymanjaneb@shaw.ca
text:
I Requested for a document that has a link to javascript with leads to DHTML 
Menu bar but when the server return the document it displays the document 
except my DHTML content are not displayed at all. I added the link to the 
javascript file within the <HEAD></HEAD> tag and still can't display the 
document properly. the DHTML javascript is build by a software called soThink 
DHTML Menu and their web site located at www.sothink.com . so please notify me 
with a proper solution to this matter , and your effort is trully appricated.

Thank you
Ali

Created attachment 2420
This is the javascript file generated by the software soThink DHTML Menu
creator: aymanjaneb@shaw.ca
slive@apache.org
text:
Sorry, but this really seems like a problem with your client-side scripting.
Apache does not do anything at all with dhtml/javascript other than delivering
it to the client.

Thanks for using Apache.

Mod_Alias does not recognize a Document that has a DHTML content, it only 
format the document as a normal HTML file and ignore the DHTML content. please 
notify me when this problem is fixed . thank you for your time.

Ali
creator: aymanjaneb@shaw.ca

text:
You have not provided NEARLY enough information to qualify this as a bug
  in the Apache server... I believe Joshua's observations were right on.

  Do NOT reopen this bug.  This database is only for reporting bugs in the
  Apache products, not for user configuration problems or questions.

  Please DO refer your question to an appropriate users forum ... with some
  significantly greater detail about the document you are trying to send,
  the headers that the document includes, and so forth.  You may also be
  interested in working with soThink about your DHTML software to narrow
  down your problem.

  This is not a problem with the Apache software.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
